players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafia. Be cautious."
You: "I'll protect Bob, consider him. Watch out for Diana."
Diana: "Bob, thanks for the tip. Investigating you next night."
Bob: "Thanks Diana, keeping an eye on both Alice & Charlie. Stay alert!"
Diana: "Thanks for the info, Bob. Considering your tip and Charlie's elimination."
You: "Considering Bob's info, watch out for Diana. Stay united."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob

Diana: "Bob, thanks for the tip. Investigating you next night."
You: "Thanks Diana, keeping an eye on both Alice & Charlie. Stay alert!"
Diana: "Thanks for the info, Bob. Considering your tip and Charlie's elimination."
Alice: "Considering Bob's info, watch out for Diana. Stay united."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
